thread.section_title: Hotel d'Orsay - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Still of the same great standard
thread.title_full: Still of the same great standard - Review of Hotel d'Orsay - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Clare W
title: Still of the same great standard
text:
When we arrived the room we had specifically requested at the time of booking had been given to another guest (we had had an email confirming our request). We were disappointed as this was our favourite room. We made our way to our newly allocated room, a little fed up. The phone rang and we were told that we were being given the suite as an apology. We have stayed in the suite before and so this went some way towards making up for the mix up. Breakfast was excellent every day and the male waiter is exceptionally professional, courteous and helpful. I'm sorry that I don't know his name but he has been at the hotel for some time. This remains my hotel of choice in Paris - good location, lovely accommodation and excellent staff.
Room Tip: 64 is the top floor suite, 55 (street side) and 56 (courtyard but near elevator - not at all noisy... See more room tips
